meanings.definition: To remove the hair from (an animal hide)
meanings.sent1: She is dehairing the hide to prepare it for tanning.
meanings.sent2: The workers dehairing the animal hide were skilled at their job.
meanings.sent3: The dehairing process turned into a messy affair when the goats started playing in the shaving cream.
meanings.sent4: The dehairing of the hide revealed its true quality, like peeling away layers of disguise.
meanings.sent5: The dehairing machine hummed as it efficiently stripped the hide of its hair.

meanings.definition: The process of removing hair from an animal hide
meanings.sent1: Dehairing is an essential step in leather production.
meanings.sent2: During dehairing, the hair is separated from the hide to make it suitable for use.
meanings.sent3: The dehairing station at the factory always smelled like wet fur and soap.
meanings.sent4: In the world of leather crafting, dehairing is like the first brushstroke on a blank canvas.
meanings.sent5: The dehairing process can be time-consuming but results in a smooth, hair-free hide.
